name: Longing for the Drop
description:
Longing for the Drop is a music-based twin-stick shooter, where the intensity of the music defines your score multiplier.

Controls for Xbox One gamepad:

  • left stick - move
  • right stick - fire
Controls for keyboard/mouse:
  • WSAD - move
  • mouse - look around
  • left mouse button - fire

Made by:

  • Code/art - Luke Spierewka
  • Sound - Michael Hoffmann
  • Music - Akash Thakkar
